New Records: Payton Pritchard had 22 points on six 3-pointers
Derrick White added 18 points and eight rebounds
LaMelo Ball eclipsed the 30-point barrier with 36 points
Key Match Events: Celtics built a 19-point lead in the second quarter
Jrue Holiday hit a 3-pointer to end the Hornets' rally
Grant Williams was ejected after a flagrant-two foul
Pre-Game Insights: Jaylen Brown sat out with a hip flexor strain
Post-Match Reflections: Celtics improved to 6-1 with the win
LaMelo Ball's foul trouble needs improvement
Miscellaneous Highlights: Hornets were without top centers Mark Williams and Nick Richards
